text:
Distance and rate problem

Q A passanger train left the station and\nO traveled toward the repair yards at an\n0\naverage speed of [imath] 29.2 \mathrm{km} / \mathrm{h} [/imath]. A cattle train left 2.4 hours later and traveled in the same direction but with an average\nis speed of [imath] 36.5 \mathrm{km} / \mathrm{h} [/imath]. How long did the\npassenger train travel before the cattle train caught up?
